application

Class NewsReaderModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.NewsReaderModel

  • class NewsReaderModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the services needed for NewsReader controller
    Author:
    √ÅngelLucas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ObservableList<Article> articles
      Observable list with all articles, needed for a ListView control
      private ObservableList<Categories> categories
      Observable list with all categories, needed for a ComboBox control
      private ConnectionManager connectionManager
      if dummyData is false an instance of modelManager will be used to retrieve all available articles from the server
      private boolean dummyData
      if dummyData is true all data for the model are generated by itself.

    • Field Detail

      • articles

        private ObservableList<Article> articles
        Observable list with all articles, needed for a ListView control

      • categories

        private ObservableList<Categories> categories
        Observable list with all categories, needed for a ComboBox control

      • dummyData

        private boolean dummyData
        if dummyData is true all data for the model are generated by itself. In other case this class will connect with a server in order to retrieve all available articles

      • connectionManager

        private ConnectionManager connectionManager
        if dummyData is false an instance of modelManager will be used to retrieve all available articles from the server

    • Constructor Detail

      • NewsReaderModel

        NewsReaderModel()

    • Method Detail

      • getArticles

        ObservableList<Article> getArticles()
        Returns:
        an observable list with the articles

      • getCategories

        ObservableList<Categories> getCategories()
        Returns:
        an observable list with the categories

      • addArticle

        void addArticle(Article article)
        Add a new article
        Parameters:
        article - is added to the observable list, so if there is a ListView using this observable list, the article will appear in this control instantly

      • deleteArticle

        void deleteArticle(Article article)
        Remove an article from the list and from the server
        Parameters:
        article - to be removed

      • setDummyData

        void setDummyData(boolean dummy)

      • getConnectionManager

        ConnectionManager getConnectionManager()

      • setConnectionManager

        void setConnectionManager(ConnectionManager connectionManager)

      • retrieveData

        void retrieveData()
        This method retrieve all articles and categories. If dummyData is true all needed data will be generated. In other case the data will be retrieved from server

      • dataFromServer

        private void dataFromServer()

      • loadCategories

        private void loadCategories()
        This method load the available categories
